input.sentences: my friend | [male] | standing in front of his house .
some of [male] 's friends have come to hear the speech .
one of the people from the crowd had something to say during the speech .
other people from the crowd raised their hand to ask some questions .

output.sentences: Casually leaning against the door frame, he waited for his friends to react to what he's just said.
They stared back at him absorbing the news.
Not knowing what to say, he threw his arm up in disgust.
The only female present did not approve the language used to query the speaker.
